value.title: Download sample datasets and reports for Power BI and Excel
value.excerpt: Sample datasets and reports are great for learning and getting inspiration so in todays video I will share some resources you can download and use right away!  Link to resources: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/power-bi/create-reports/sample-datasets#the-power-bi-samples-as-pbix-files and https://github.com/microsoft/powerbi-desktop-samples/tree/master/Sample%20Reports

value.title: Easily add query parameters to your source paths - Power BI Tips & Tricks #16
value.excerpt: In this tutorial, I show you how to easily add query parameters into your source paths using the advance editor function.   Looking for a download file? value.title: Running totals in power query??? Yes, you can :)

Also, I will show you how List.Range work, really cool function :)  Here you can download all the pbix files: https://curbal.com/donwload-center
